definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: In irrigated desert soil, the economic benefit of resin coated urea application was superior to that of urea;
sentences.chinese: 灌漠土上施用樹脂包衣尿素的經濟效益好於普通尿素。

sentences.english: Objective to improve the coating material of wuji baifeng pills.
sentences.chinese: 摘要目的對烏雞白鳳丸包衣材料進行改進。

sentences.english: Palygorskite coated urea can effectively improve the yield of spring wheat.
sentences.chinese: 坡縷石包衣尿素能有效促進春小麥增產。

sentences.english: Powder coating and have high repeatability of process.
sentences.chinese: 完成粉末的包衣工藝重複性極高。

sentences.english: The earlier the sowing date was, the smaller effect on seeding stage the coating strength had.
sentences.chinese: 播期越早，包衣強度對玉米種子出苗期的影響越小。

sentences.english: The pellets are further provided with an enteric coating layer.
sentences.chinese: 小丸還用腸溶衣層包衣。

sentences.english: Methods for manufacturing coated confectionery products are provided.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供了製造包衣的糖食產品的方法。

sentences.english: ResultsThin film coating can promote the storage stability of Mango Anticough Tablet.
sentences.chinese: 結果薄膜包衣可提高芒果止咳片的儲存期穩定性。

sentences.english: Seed can be coated with fungicide to provide protection before emergence.
sentences.chinese: 種子可以用殺真菌劑包衣，使其在萌芽前受到保護。

sentences.english: The coated seeds had better be stored within one planting year.
sentences.chinese: 包衣種子貯藏時間不應超過一個種植年度。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To select the coating fluid prescription of nefopam controlled release pellets.
sentences.chinese: 目的篩選平痛新控釋微丸包衣液處方。

sentences.english: In addition to all of the above characteristics, which can reduce 15% seed coating chemicals use.
sentences.chinese: 該機除具有上述特點外，還可減少包衣劑損失15%。

sentences.english: Having all features of BGB Series High Eficiency Coater.
sentences.chinese: 具備了BGB系列高效包衣機的所有特點。

sentences.english: Cover tinidazole surface with a layer of membranes.
sentences.chinese: 採用薄膜包衣法將替硝唑表面覆蓋一層薄膜衣。

sentences.english: Coating treatment with the chemical could hasten the seedling tillows and promote the fresh weight of wheat seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 麥種包衣處理後能促進麥苗分櫱，提高百株鮮重。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the formulation of enteric coating of erythromycin.
sentences.chinese: 目的優化紅黴素腸溶薄膜包衣配方。

definition: Eight Banners, military organization of Manchu later Jin dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1] from c. 1600, subsequently of the Qing dynasty
Manchu household register (during the Qing Dynasty)
Manchu/bannerman (refers to the eight Manchu banners 八旗[Ba1 qi2])
Manchou township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
in Qing dynasty, Manchurian word for wife
child of a Manchu bannerman family (nobility)/(fig.) privileged brat
